bean.description: ContactExtract job gets contact info from salesforce and saves info into a CSV file.

entry.value: SELECT Id, FirstName, LastName, c501_cm__ii_Primary_Contact__c, c501_cm__ii_Substitute_Pool_Status__c, c501_cm__C501_Cpr_Cert_Days_Remaining__c, c501_cm__C501_First_Aid_Cert_Days_Remaining__c, c501_cm__C501_Food_Handler_Cert_Remaining_Days__c, c501_cm__C501_Safe_Sleep_Cert_Remaining_Days__c, c501_cm__C501_PBC_Cert_Remaining_Days__c, c501_cm__PREPARE_Cohort__c, c501_cm__C501_Certs_Expiring_Message__c, c501_cm__PREPARE_Class__c, RecordTypeId, c501_cm__ii_Member_ID__c, c501_cm__ii_SSPS_Number__c, c501_cm__ii_FamLink_Id__c, c501_cm__ii_Stars_Id__c, Email, Phone, MailingStreet, MailingCity, MailingState, MailingPostalCode, c501_cm__ii_County__c, c501_cm__ii_Facility_Name__c, c501_cm__ii_Sub_Pool_Status__c, Languages_Spoken__c, c501_cm__ii_Employer_Name__c, c501_cm__ii_Licensed__c, c501_cm__ii_Unit_Status__c, c501_cm__Imagine_Mobile_Phone__c FROM Contact
